title: Twas The Night
description:
Twas The Night is a light-hearted city builder and management simulation where you take on the role of Santa Claus, from the humble beginnings of building wood toys to delivering future tech to children worldwide.
Christmas Spirit What is Santa without belief? Gain believers and the ability to build more workshops to deliver on your Christmas promise. It’s the only currency Santa deals in. Run out of Christmas Spirit and you will cease to exist.
Manage Toy Production Days of the year fly by in seconds. Race the clock and win bonus Christmas Spirit by fulfilling all Christmas wishes before Christmas Eve. Use Christmas Spirit to build additional workshops, unlock upgrades, and create new Traditions that last for generations. Alien: Rogue Incursion
Polar Night/Day With 265 days until Christmas and polar darkness setting in, believers’ letters pour into the mailroom. Now is the perfect opportunity to fine-tune workshop output to magically grant all wishes. On Christmas day, you will get your final report. Will you have enough Christmas Spirit to keep the magic flowing?
If you make it through Christmas, rejoice! The sun is shining , the elves are on vacation, production stops and letters do not come in for the first 100 days of the next year making this a perfect time to do some much-needed upgrades and maintenance in preparation for the coming holiday season.
Wishlist Now and Follow We’ll reveal more about the game as we get closer to release if you want to be the first to see the gameplay trailer or read about feature highlights, make sure to Wishlist and Follow!
